nameAwardEventDetails.description: (In recognition of the sexism he displayed when, according to police reports, he called a female officer 'sugar tits,' during his more famously anti-Semitic rant. We wish to assure Mr. Gibson that we heard the full scope of his rage that evening- not just the Jewish part.)
